akn:content.akn:p: § 60909. Multiple agencies In the case that more than one agency conducted the initial investigation of a cold case murder, each agency shall coordinate their case file review or full reinvestigation such that there is only one joint case file review or full reinvestigation occurring at a time in compliance with section 60901(f) or 60903(d) of this title, as applicable. (Pub. L. 117–164, § 10, Aug. 3, 2022, 136 Stat. 1361.)
